channel.title: Exhibition on Anand Chowdhary
channel.description: Recent content in Exhibition on Anand Chowdhary

item.title: Dutch Design Week
item.description: I’ll be showcasing Shravan by Oswald Labs as part of the Mind the Step exhibition at the Dutch Design Week 2018 in the Klokgebouw in Eindhoven. The event features design-driven technology and research by the 4TU, the consortium of Dutch technical universities.
